Header: PM discusses the Kelaniya Duruthu Perahera
Content: A discussion was held at Temple Trees yesterday under the patronage of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa on the conduct of the Duruthu Perahera of the Kelaniya Raja Maha Vihare. The Perahera will be held on the 06th, 07th and 08th of January. Plans are afoot to hold the Perahera in a manner most attractive to local as well as foreign onlookers with the inclusion of elephants and arts and cultural features in the historic Duruthu Perahera. Chief Incumbent of the Kelaniya Raja Maha Vihare the Ven. Prof. Kollupitiye Mahinda Sangarakkitha Thera expressed the gratitude of the Dayaka Sabha to the Prime Minister for the support extended for the conduct of the Duruthu Perahera successfully immediately with the assumption of office of the new Government. Expressing his views on the occasion the Prime Minister pointed out that as a Government it would do its utmost for the conduct of the Duruthu Perahra successfully. The Prime Minister instructed the state officials who joined in the occasion to make their unstinted contribution for the Perahera.
